description: This survey of Russian culture and civilization uses original Russian texts on history, the arts, religion, and education, as well as documentary films and selections from literature. The course fosters the acquisition of the language of Russian cultural and intellectual discourse. Prerequisite: Russian Language and Area Studies 251 or special permission of the instructor. Offered annually in the Spring Semester.
name: Russ Culture & Civ
prerequisites: Russian Language and Area Studies 251 or special permission of the instructor. Offered annually in the Spring Semester.
